@DerSchwarzBaron The UK government has yet to propose anything, if that is so east why have they done nothing?? BTW downloading and printing off forms every time you cross the border is just not going to happen...

@Stamfordcat78 @KilclooneyJohn There is a myth that the EU is playing hardball, they are representing their interests all right but the UK Gov have no real idea what they want even now.... That has frustrated the hell out of the EU negotiators.
@conor_pope Was he trying to prevent a hard or soft #Brexit?
@Stamfordcat78 @KilclooneyJohn The Canada deal is not leaving with no deal on WTO rules, thats what you say you want. Reconcile that with no border.
@DUPleader @GMB @piersmorgan @susannareid100 What do the DUP propose to do about the border then? answers needed rather than just posturing .....

@Stamfordcat78 @KilclooneyJohn You can't advocate leaving the customs union, taking control of your borders then doing nothing and leaving the only land border you have completely open.... Thats just nonsense.
@KilclooneyJohn @Stamfordcat78 At least you have a proposal John, more than most...
@Stamfordcat78 @KilclooneyJohn So what do you propose to do about the border?

@Stamfordcat78 @KilclooneyJohn You can't have it every way, leaving the customs union means erecting a border. That is the UK and solely the UK's choice. Varadkar has the support of every party in ROI for his approach, majority of people in NI don't want a hard border either.
